description:

name: UserWay Accessiblity Widget
plugin_instructions:
Create your userway account.
Go in plugin tab and enter your Account ID
Put element on the page and configure. 

You can create your own menu with all the element action.

NOTE: LIMIT ON TEXT SIZE INCREASE. Because how bubble work with positionning elements, the Increase text size doesn'T work perfectly. I suggest you to create your own menu instead and use Font size and conditionnal.

You can have more option with a userway paid account.
